meanings.definition: The act of keeping something safe or protected.
meanings.sent1: I entrusted the safekeepings of my jewelry to the bank vault.
meanings.sent2: She placed her important documents in the safekeepings of a fireproof safe.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's safekeepings of acorns were so well hidden that even he couldn't find them!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a treasure chest, the safekeepings of her deepest emotions locked away.
meanings.sent5: The knight's armor was the safekeepings of his bravery, shining in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Items or valuables that are kept safe or protected.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient artifacts in secure safekeepings.
meanings.sent2: He stored his collection of rare coins in the safekeepings of a hidden safe.
meanings.sent3: The safekeepings of the pirate's treasure chest turned out to be just a box of chocolate coins!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the safekeepings of joy, a precious gift to all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The safekeepings of memories in her mind were like a library of moments, each one carefully preserved.
